thread.title: Authorities: Man shocks attorney with cattle prod, charged - Maine news
thread.title_full: Authorities: Man shocks attorney with cattle prod, charged - Maine news

author: boston.com
title: Authorities: Man shocks attorney with cattle prod, charged - Maine news
text:
ALFRED, Maine (AP) â€” Authorities say a Waterboro man has been arrested after he shocked a woman with a cattle prod while wearing a wig.
York County Sheriff Bill King says the 48-year-old man assaulted the woman, who works as a court mediator, early Thursday evening. He is expected to appear in court Tuesday on attempted kidnapping and assault charges.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below King says the incident happened outside an Arundel home. He says the man placed a cattle prod between her legs and shocked her when she was exiting her vehicle. He then allegedly placed his hands over her mouth as she fought him, then fled in a vehicle.
An investigation revealed that the attorney had encountered him several years ago during a child custody dispute.
He faces up to 15 years in prison if convicted.
